overview:
Ameer Flippin made a transition from financial services as an investment advisor to technology by launching the now dormant web brand, Apextechstocks.com, which offered financial newsletters.

Recently, Ameer launched Vegas3rdeye.com covering music, culture, and entertainment. Flying solo, Ameer has carved a niche’ by doing short interviews of bands and people in the entertainment industry with a radio talk show format.

In 2010, Ameer will launch several online brands to help “spark” progress in different walks of life as technology rapidly changes our lives.
